item.title: it@cork Annual Conference Announced
item.description: TheÂ it@cork annual conference has just been announced. Its title is “GREEN IT: Reduce CO2, Raise Profits” and it’s on November 26 in the lovely Radisson SAS Hotel in Cork. The line-up looks like an excellent mix with the focus being clearly on Green as it relates to IT and Business. I particularly like the profit angle given the turmoil the world is going through right now The is an Early Bird Discount available - Book on or before October 31 and it’s €250 for members, €350 for non members.
